remarks: The relation "is isomorphic to" for categories.  (Contributed by AV, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
cic.i $e |- I = ( Iso ` C ) $.
cic.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
cic.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
cic.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
cic.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
brcic $p |- ( ph -> ( X ( ~=c ` C ) Y <-> ( X I Y ) =/= (/) ) ) $.
